Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Total time for 'Accepted + Wait' before transitioning to 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Minimum time to transition from 'Accepted + Wait' to any subsequent activity
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and the end of the case

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' when followed by 'Accepted + Assigned'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Assigned'

Name: Total resolution time of cases involving 'Accepted + Wait'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and the end of the case

Name: Average time it takes to complete 'Accepted + Wait' after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + Wait'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Accepted + Wait' in comparison to 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Total time for 'Accepted + Wait' across all cases in the VINST system
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and the end of the case

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases that also involve 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Minimum time from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Average time it takes to transition from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation'

Name: Total time it takes 'Accepted + Wait' to be done before reaching 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Minimum time to transition from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'

Name: Total time for 'Accepted + Wait' grouped by country
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and the end of case grouped by the last value of organization country

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Completed + Resolved' in high-frequency variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases with 'Completed + In Call' to understand its impact
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Minimum time for 'Accepted + Wait' in the shortest process variant involving 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Average duration of 'Accepted + Wait' in cases that transition through multiple 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' before completion
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and activity Queued + Awaiting Assignment for cases where activity Queued + Awaiting Assignment occurs
